result.arabic_text: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلٗا وَنَسِيَ خَلۡقَهُۥۖ قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ
result.translation: producing arguments[23] against Us while forgetting his own creation[24]. He says, “Who can give life to the bones after they have crumbled to dust?”
result.footnotes:
[23] Trying to prove that there is no life after death.
 [24] That we created him from dead matter to such an extent that he became now a clear disputant before Us.
